SENT.plain: Extrahematologic manifestations, such as symptoms of rheumatic disease, have been recorded in association with myelodysplastic syndromes, including chronic myelomonocytic leukemia (CMML)
We report the case of a 51-year-old woman with tumoral infiltration of the Achilles tendons bilaterally, indicating CMML
This diagnosis was confirmed at postmortem examination
